column5: Beautiful 1907 Victorian Home Located in La Porte, Texas. There is Two large suites and two rooms, all with private restrooms. Large swimming pool to enjoy. Perfect for honey moons, anniversaries, Vacations or business travelers .We have wonderful gardens to stroll through. If you are in town for 2 days, 2 months or 2 years, we have a room or suite just waiting for you. 85.00 per room, per night, Weekend price 134 per suite, per night, Each rooms sleeps 2 adults. Price is for one room .
